name: PARTY-TRIP-ROAD
description:
You're very late for the party you were invited to, but it turns out there's a convenient, 8 level long shortcut that can get you there! Too bad it's filled with dozens of other drivers (and none of you really know how to drive).

Created for the GDS Winter Game Jam 2022, theme for this title was "Late to the party".

Made in Gamemaker Studio 2.

CREDITS:

-  BGM: Like a Bird - Gran Turismo 5 (Kemmei Adachi)
